duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement sales and marketing plans to increase revenue, market share, and customer retention.
Coordinate sales efforts on a local, regional, and national basis to maximize customer loyalty and revenue.
Drive revenue growth with existing and prospective customers to achieve regional sales & profit objectives.
Establish sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales goals for the region.
Direct management of the Outside Sales Representatives within the region, including account performance and KPI’s.
Assist in developing and implementing sales tools that will benefit all sales staff.
Report monthly on sales and marketing activities within the assigned operating center, including new clients, target accounts, and actions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
